net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_getSaveEffect
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Returns a descriptor indicating the result of saving against the Save Damage roll. This is a free-form value determined by the generator of the roll. Typical examples are:
"No Effect" "Half Damage" "Damage is unchanged; Other effects are avoided"
